SEARCH
Module org.example.taskmanager
Package model.toDoList

Interface Task

All Known Subinterfaces:
BooleanTask, ProgressiveTask, SimpleTask
All Known Implementing Classes:
BooleanTaskStd, ComplexTask, ProgressiveTaskStd
public interface Task
A task is represented by its description, a deadline, a priority, an estimated time and progress. Each property is editable except deadline and estimated time.

  • Method Summary
